title: Handle a Stolen Ticket Report
description: A fan reports that their physical tickets for a game were stolen.

tasks.description: Identify the fan and the specific tickets that were stolen.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the tickets in the system.

tasks.description: Deactivate the barcodes of the stolen physical tickets to render them invalid.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully invalidates the old tickets.

tasks.description: Reissue the tickets to the fan as mobile tickets through the team's app.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the fan with new, secure mobile tickets.
